extension.summary: A skin designed to support MOD's Digital Signage Project. (a derivative of Confluence)
A skin designed to support MOD's Digital Signage Project. (a derivative of Confluence)
extension.description: The Digital Signage Skin has a number of features intended to support non-interactive digital signage installations and is used in concert with other digital signage addons and a server. Added or modified elements include an informational overlay for when signage content is playing and hiding unneeded or undesired elements. It is still a work in progress.
